channel.title: cross compilation on VS tech corner
channel.description: Recent content in cross compilation on VS tech corner

item.title: cross compiling rust from linux to rpi0/alpine
item.description: If you read my previous posts, you should now have a raspberry-pi running alpine and docker. Resources are pretty limited on rpi0, so we are going to deploy programs using rust. Note: golang could have fit in there as well (and ofc all C and close to machine languages). Compiling from NOT a rpi0 Obviously, you don’t want to compile from a raspberry pi zero, unless you have all the time in the world and love waiting.
